mapper.sql: MARKET_ID, MARKETNAME, MARKETDESC, CONTRACTPEOPLE, CONTRACTPHONE, ACCOUNTER, PERCENT, WXFLAG, WXAPPID, WXAPPSECRET, WXMCHID, WXMCHKEY, DYFLAG, DYAPPID, DYAPPSECRET, DYMCHID, DYPUBLICKEY, DYPRIVATEKEY, DOMAIN_ID
mapper.select:
select m.MARKET_ID, m.MARKETNAME, m.MARKETDESC, m.CONTRACTPEOPLE, m.CONTRACTPHONE, m.ACCOUNTER, m.PERCENT, m.WXFLAG, m.WXAPPID, m.WXAPPSECRET, m.WXMCHID, m.WXMCHKEY, m.DYFLAG, m.DYAPPID, m.DYAPPSECRET, m.DYMCHID, m.DYPUBLICKEY, m.DYPRIVATEKEY, m.DOMAIN_ID, dn.DOMAINNAME, f1.FILE_ID AS FILE_ID1, f1.FILEPATH AS FILEPATH1, f1.FILENAME AS FILENAME1, f2.FILE_ID AS FILE_ID2, f2.FILEPATH AS FILEPATH2, f2.FILENAME AS FILENAME2 from m left join domain dn on m.domain_id = dn.domain_id left join file f1 on m.market_id = f1.reference_id and f1.filetype = '9' left join file f2 on m.market_id = f2.reference_id and f2.filetype = '10' where 1 = 1
and ( m.MARKETNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and m.domain_id = #{pd.DOMAIN_ID}
order by m.MARKET_ID ASC

select m.MARKET_ID, m.MARKETNAME, m.MARKETDESC, m.CONTRACTPEOPLE, m.CONTRACTPHONE, m.ACCOUNTER, m.PERCENT, m.WXFLAG, m.WXAPPID, m.WXAPPSECRET, m.WXMCHID, m.WXMCHKEY, m.DYFLAG, m.DYAPPID, m.DYAPPSECRET, m.DYMCHID, m.DYPUBLICKEY, m.DYPRIVATEKEY, m.DOMAIN_ID, dn.DOMAINNAME, f1.FILE_ID AS FILE_ID1, f1.FILEPATH AS FILEPATH1, f1.FILENAME AS FILENAME1, f2.FILE_ID AS FILE_ID2, f2.FILEPATH AS FILEPATH2, f2.FILENAME AS FILENAME2 from m left join domain dn on m.domain_id = dn.domain_id left join file f1 on m.market_id = f1.reference_id and f1.filetype = '9' left join file f2 on m.market_id = f2.reference_id and f2.filetype = '10' where 1 = 1
and ( m.MARKETNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keywords}),'%') )
and m.domain_id = #{DOMAIN_ID}
order by m.MARKET_ID ASC

select m.MARKET_ID, m.MARKETNAME, m.MARKETDESC, m.CONTRACTPEOPLE, m.CONTRACTPHONE, m.ACCOUNTER, m.PERCENT, m.WXFLAG, m.WXAPPID, m.WXAPPSECRET, m.WXMCHID, m.WXMCHKEY, m.DYFLAG, m.DYAPPID, m.DYAPPSECRET, m.DYMCHID, m.DYPUBLICKEY, m.DYPRIVATEKEY, m.DOMAIN_ID, f1.FILE_ID AS FILE_ID1, f1.FILEPATH AS FILEPATH1, f1.FILENAME AS FILENAME1, f2.FILE_ID AS FILE_ID2, f2.FILEPATH AS FILEPATH2, f2.FILENAME AS FILENAME2 from m left join file f1 on m.market_id = f1.reference_id and f1.filetype = '9' left join file f2 on m.market_id = f2.reference_id and f2.filetype = '10' where m.MARKET_ID = #{MARKET_ID}
